1.If possible,choose agnostic when choosing ya race...
2.kill as many orcs as possible

-----Original Message-----
From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>
To: SG-Everquest Mailing List <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, June 14, 1999 8:30 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Something...


hi all,
it seems that quite abit had happened over the pass weekend when i wasnt around... the party got formed... n stuff like that... n ive readup abit on the few websites over the weekend... i think in general... the necromancer has spells that spread over a pretty wide range... from summoning... to direct damage... to healing... that no one spellcasting class can provide... however this is with the drawback of faction.... so i guess my first char in EQ will most likely be a Necromancer... but i havent decide to make a Erudite or Dark Elf Necro ... most likely Dark Elf... but i think i need to do more research on faction n stuff like that.... maybe some of u guys can help me out here... esp Leshrec...
1. is it that bad that a Dark Elf Necro is KOS in other towns/cities?
2. how difficult is to be able to better the faction so that one can enter those cities without KOS? n how can u do it?
3. what about Eruite Necro?

Pls advice :) although i havent got my EQ here yet... but i would like to be fully prepared fer it b4 it comes... :) hopefully within this week... otherwise next... as i can only play during the weekend... BTW... count me in... in ya guild.... i should be in the same server as u guys... but i guess i will be progressing slowly... most likely i will be using SilverHand. :)

Also, not sure about Trade Skills... anyone has any advice fer Necros? Also, u think it will be better to have 1 trade skills on a char rather than 2? or does it matter? thats all i got fer now...

cheers,
Fred
